name: A Cute Gummy Bear Sweet Bounce Adventure
name_original: A Cute Gummy Bear Sweet Bounce Adventure
description:
TRICK OR TREATS..?

Well, you don't have to choose anymore!

This game has just the right amount of sweet treats and neat tricks!!

Run gummy bear! Run!
Collect the treats and avoid the scary monsters!

Collect coins to unlock all other gummy bears!
Run through a magnet to help collect more coins!

Use pumpkins to get a boost and eliminate monsters!!

Avoid falling on cliffs or you're squished

Features++
>Cute and huggable characters
>Super duper easy controls
>Easy gameplay suitable for kids!
